msbt.message: Umm I was waiting for you at my place for, likeFOREVER!C'mon, . You totes forgot about us hanging out, didn't you? <10_4 />So lame!But I forgive you. I mean, I forget where I'm supposed to be all the time!Actually, I don't even know if I'm supposed to be somewhere right now
I know that we, I guess you'd say, "agreed" on a time for yoooou to come over to myyyyy placeBut something kind ofcame up, and I need to cancel. I'm SO sorry. I'll invite you again some other time.
I totes have to apologize, .I promised we'd hang out But I wasn't home when I said I'd be, and that was tr√®s lame of me.I'm SO sorry! If we get the chance, I'd love to hang out some other time!
